conbody.p: Once the com.miramo.mmpdf folder is installed in the DITA-OT plugins folder, set up the MiramoPDF transformation scenario: Choose options->import transformation scenarios, then navigate to the MiramoPDF.scenarios file located in the com.miramo.mmpdf/integration/oxygen subfolder (by default,[oxygen_install_dir]/frameworks/dita/DITA-OT3.x/plugins/com.miramo.mmpdf/integration/oxygen ).

This creates the MiramoPDF and MiramoPDF dev (with PDF tooltips) transformation scenarios, which are set up to produce a PDF from the currently edited DITA file, and which can be applied and modified as required. See for more information.
